title: It's a girl thing / precious font
content:
Hi all

Can anybody identify these two fonts for me please.

tia

sandra

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [It's-a-girl-thing.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090412040426/http:/typophile.com/files/It's-a-girl-thing.jpg) | 54.35 KB |
| [Precious.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20090412040426/http:/typophile.com/files/Precious.jpg) | 17.34 KB |
author: Sandra Meek

comments.content: The Precious one is quite similar to Brush Script, whereas I seem to remember the It’s A Girl Thing as a freeware font. I couldn’t locate it though.
